verses.plain: God standeth in the congregation of the mighty; he judgeth among the gods.

tokens.t: God standeth in the congregation of the mighty; he judgeth among the gods.

verses.plain: How long will ye judge unjustly, and accept the persons of the wicked? Selah.

tokens.t: How long will ye judge unjustly, and accept the persons of the wicked? Selah.

verses.plain: Defend the poor and fatherless: do justice to the afflicted and needy.

tokens.t: Defend the poor and fatherless: do justice to the afflicted and needy.

verses.plain: Deliver the poor and needy: rid them out of the hand of the wicked.

tokens.t: Deliver the poor and needy: rid
out of the hand of the wicked.

verses.plain: They know not, neither will they understand; they walk on in darkness: all the foundations of the earth are out of course.

tokens.t: They know not, neither will they understand; they walk on in darkness: all the foundations of the earth are out of course.

verses.plain: I have said, Ye are gods; and all of you are children of the most High.
But ye shall die like men, and fall like one of the princes.

tokens.t: But ye shall die like men, and fall like one of the princes.

verses.plain: Arise, O God, judge the earth: for thou shalt inherit all nations.

tokens.t: Arise, O God, judge the earth: for thou shalt inherit all nations.
